name: Lalkamal Nilkamal
description:
This is a fun game, which begins in a faraway land, its a story of gold and iron and one which entailed long journeys.
Best folk based action game of the year .
Super small size! Cool 3D engine!
Realistic action! Vivid graphics!
More realistic and thorough game experience!
Come on and download this game!
very popular action adventure game . Its graphics and game control are very wonderful!

Features
Smooth game control
Vivid background music is in harmony with the game!
Add different game scenes!
